trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> event of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> é criado quando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objeto gera um `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` eventos.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information related to an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event, access the following properties in the handler for the event:
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações relacionadas a um `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` eventos, acessar as propriedades a seguir no manipulador para o evento:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do dispositivo de entrada no seu fluxo de áudio gerado.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro de sua entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Essas posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property indicates which problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> propriedade indica que o problema ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> deriva de <xref:System.EventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an event handler that gathers information about an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioSignalProblemOccurred> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define um manipulador de eventos que coleta informações sobre um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioSignalProblemOccurred> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio level associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nível de áudio associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The level of audio input when the <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: O nível de áudio de entrada quando o <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the input device's audio stream that indicates where the problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição no fluxo de áudio do dispositivo de entrada que indica em que ponto ocorreu o problema.

trans-unit.source: The position in the input device's audio stream when the <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que o dispositivo de entrada de áudio de fluxo quando o <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do dispositivo de entrada no seu fluxo de áudio gerado.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro de sua entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Essas posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio signal problem.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o problema de sinal de áudio.

trans-unit.source: The audio signal problem that caused the <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: O problema de sinal de áudio que causou o <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> evento ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the audio input that the recognizer has received that indicates where the problem occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição em que a entrada de áudio que o reconhecedor recebeu que indica em que ponto ocorreu o problema.

trans-unit.source: The position in the audio input that the recognizer has received when the <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A posição na entrada de áudio que recebeu o reconhecedor quando o <c>AudioSignalProblemOccurred</c> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do dispositivo de entrada no seu fluxo de áudio gerado.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> propriedade faz referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro de sua entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Essas posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
